ryrycipe.controller

Class MaterialNumberDialogController

  • java.lang.Object
    • ryrycipe.controller.MaterialNumberDialogController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.fxml.Initializable

    public class MaterialNumberDialogController
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
    Controller for the dialog used to select a number of material to include in the recipe.

      • handleOKBtn

        public void handleOKBtn()
        Close the dialog and update the corresponding RecipeComponent with the chosen MaterialView and number. Note: Do nothing if no value is chosen.

        Close the dialog when the user clicks the cancel button.
